data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 194,700 citizens of the the state of Đakovica.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Đakovica, Kosovo
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Đakovica that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.section_summary: On average, 15 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Đakovica, Kosovo.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Đakovica, Kosovo to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Father, help the 379 believers in Đakovica to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Gorani people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Đakovica
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Đakovica a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.section_summary:
the state of Đakovica, Kosovo has a population of 194,700.

We estimate Đakovica has 379 people who might know Jesus, 7,728 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 186,593 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 513 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Đakovica, Kosovo to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 194,321 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood
